title: In Munich, Rubio Stresses Shared History to Europeans but Warns of ‘Civilizational Erasure’
summary_full: In his speech at the Munich Security Conference, Secretary of State Marco Rubio voiced some far-right ideas, but his diplomatic tone came as a relief to the audience.
summary_public: In his speech at the Munich Security Conference, Secretary of State Marco Rubio voiced some far-right ideas, but his diplomatic tone came as a relief to the audience.
